testcase.name: Validate invalid login attempt

Message...................passed

testcase.name: Validate “Check All” and “Uncheck All” links
testcase.system-out: Given user is on "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/WebOrders/login.aspx".passed When user enters username as "Tester".......................................passed And user enters password as "test"..........................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user should be routed to "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/weborders/".passed When user clicks on "Check All" button......................................passed Then all rows should be checked.............................................passed When user clicks on "Uncheck All" button....................................passed Then all rows should be unchecked...........................................passed

testcase.name: Validate adding new order
testcase.system-out: Given user is on "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/WebOrders/login.aspx".passed When user enters username as "Tester".......................................passed And user enters password as "test"..........................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user should be routed to "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/weborders/".passed When user clicks on "Order" menu item.......................................passed And user selects "FamilyAlbum" as product...................................passed And user enters 2 as quantity...............................................passed And user enters all address information.....................................passed And user enters all payment information.....................................passed And user clicks on "Process" button.........................................passed And user clicks on "View all orders" menu item..............................passed Then user should see their order displayed in the "List of All Orders" table.passed And validate all information entered displayed correct with the order.......passed

testcase.name: Validate “Delete Selected” button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/WebOrders/login.aspx".passed When user enters username as "Tester".......................................passed And user enters password as "test"..........................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then user should be routed to "http://secure.smartbearsoftware.com/samples/testcomplete12/weborders/".passed When user clicks on "Check All" button......................................passed And user clicks on "Delete Selected" button.................................passed Then validate all orders are deleted from the "List of All Orders"..........passed And validate user sees "List of orders is empty. In order to add new order use this link." Message.passed
